item.title: How to create strong, unique passwords and why it matters
item.description: Weak and guessable passwords can lead you to unmeasurable destruction. Let's make your passwords stronger!

item.title: Passkeys Now Available in Chrome
item.description: No Need of Passwords Anymore #Google has announced that passkeys, a passwordless secure login standard, are now available to use on the Chrome browser. The feature, which has been in testing since October, is available on both desktop and mobile versions of Chrome running on Windows 11, macOS, and Android. Google also allows users to sync passkeys from their Android devices to other devices using either Google’s own password manager or a third-party one that supports passkeys.
